channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Working with stacked branches in git (Part 1)
item.description: In this post I describe why I like to use stacked branches and stacked PRs for larger features, and how I handle making changes to commits in the stack Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/working-with-stacked-branches-in-git-part-1/

item.title: Converting a Microsoft XNA 3.1 game to MonoGame
item.description: In this post I describe how I took a Microsoft XNA 3.1 game from 15 years ago and converted it to use MonoGame on .NET 8 in just a few hours Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/converting-an-xna-game-to-monogame/
